stance_1: I eat all kinds of meat except pork
stance_2: I eat meat four to five times a week
justification: Eating all kinds of meat except pork makes it easier to eat meat frequently, supporting the habit of eating meat four to five times a week.

stance_1: I eat all kinds of meat except pork
stance_2: Pork does not agree with my stomach
justification: The interviewee explicitly states they avoid pork because it does not agree with their stomach, directly supporting the choice to eat all kinds of meat except pork.

stance_1: I eat meat four to five times a week
stance_2: I want to get enough protein
justification: The main reason the interviewee gives for eating meat frequently is to get enough protein for health, making this an explicit and strong supportive link.
